## Suggester.onChange() method

Called whenever a suggestion becomes active or changes in anyway.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onChange?(params: SuggestChangeHandlerParams<GCommand>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | <code>SuggestChangeHandlerParams&lt;GCommand&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`

## Remarks

It receives a parameters object with the `reason` for the change for more granular control.
